places_with_reviews.name: OYO Flagship Tree Boneae Resort
address: Plot 7, Block B, Raiyar, Doodhpathri Road Near Toll Post, Budgam, Srinagar, Raiyar Beruwa, 190001

reviews.text:
1) Unclean bedsheets. Did not change the bedsheets even after repeated requests.
2) Poorest service. Hotel staff had no idea about our booking when we arrived. We booked one room for 3 people. But the bed they provided was only for 2. After repeated requests, we had to go and fetch for mattress and beddings on our own.
3) Mattresses were quie uncomfortable.
4) Bathroom was not clean when we reached. And water gets logged inside the bathroom.
5) No fan in room. Required in summers only though.
6)Nice location though
7) Can't say much about food. Since, their chef was on leave the day we reached and the owner himself cooked dinner for us and was friendly. This was the only good thing about this hotel. Gave one extra star just for this..
8) There was only one service staff who could barely understand us, our requirements, and was too lousy to provide service to so many people.
9) No latches in the balcony gates
10) Suite rooms are big but the washrooms are transparent with curtains outside the washroom. So, its ok if you are comfortable with it!!
Not bad

Such an amazing place, truly breathtaking. Surrounded by nature. We stayed there for 2 days and 1 night. The facilities were amazing. The food was also amazing unlike some other hotels . We stayed in tents as well as tree house, an amazing experience. Takes all your stress away.
If you talk about the price, if say it's really affordable given that other hotels charge more and are not even close in terms of beautiful surroundings and up to date facilities.
Rooms are amazing and clean, beds were comfortable too, plus clean washroom hygiene and constant and water supply.
The staff members are friendly and treat you like family.
Id say you should give this place a try.

Hospitality best
Nice view
All are best...you won't regret visiting
This place

Amazing place. Beautiful scenery, plus affordable price.
The staff members are really nice too. Network might not be available sometimes but you go there just to enjoy nature so I'd say less network is a plus point.
A must visit place . ❤️‍🔥
Awesome.
Must Visit place

places_with_reviews.name: OYO Home Safyan Homestay
address: Near Airtel Tawer Dabipora, Khansahib, J&K, Dabi Pora, 191111

reviews.text: Best

Don’t believe the good reviews for this hotel. I was excited to eat there because they had a big menu, but it was a huge letdown. They didn’t have mutton, chicken tandoori, or even regular roti because their tandoor was broken. I had to settle for whatever was left. They also made me wait for the chef. When the food finally came, it was terrible. The biryani and chicken seemed old, and the dessert was warm on top and cold at the bottom, and it tasted bad. We could only eat a small part of the meal. I even took a picture of the spoiled dessert before leaving. This was the worst food I’ve had in a long time, especially for the price. Avoid this place.
Absolutely Amazing Food and Service... Best restaurant at doodhpathri...
Excellent food.... Excellent hospitality.... Best restaurant at doodhpathri......

Stopped here for lunch on the way to Dudhpatri. This place is like Oasis in dessert, didn't expect such ambience, service and food quality at such remote place. If you're heading to Dudhpatri, this is a good  place for pure vegetarian food. Must try kashmiri pulav and sweet paneer subjee.
Delicious Food....Best Service...Only Fine Dining at Doodhpathri...

places_with_reviews.name: Snow Peak Chalet
address: Tagnar, Doodhpathri, near TRC, Khan Sahib, 191111

reviews.text: If you really need a break from your hectic and stressful time you need to visit this place.Awesome ambience ,tasty food with great hospitality.
Must try
Mr. Zahid was a life saviour as he agreed to give us a place to stay in a decent price, even though we seeked for the booking on-spot. Good Host !!!
We had kashmiri wazwan here, the food was really good, chef Zaahir is well experienced and innovative with his cooking. Try the dhaniawala korma and rista. 👌
Wonderful location for staying with family and friends, surrounding views are awesome
Superb food with special reference to Dhaniawali Korma and Rishta.
Had a wonderful experience special thanks to Mr.Umer

places_with_reviews.name: Lal bub hotel and restaurant
address: Near four way, DOODPATHRI, ROAD, RAIYAR, Khan Sahib, 191111

reviews.text: The food here was simply amazing. We tried Kahmiri pulao and it was simply delicious. It was made in desi ghee and served with salad and shalgam achar. Very good service and great place. Would definitely recommend to visit.

A lovely respite after our time at Doodhpatri! It was a busy period but the waitstaff were so attentive and apologetic to keep us waiting but they were clearly doing their best, so thank you! The food was lovely and the coffee  was perfect, who knew Nescafé could be made so well!
The restaurant is amazing! Their hospitality is awesome, staff is very cooperative and humble. They served delicious food, and their kashmiri pulav & kahwa is a must try!

It was our first time experience of eating the authentic Kashmiri Cuisine. The hospitality of the staffs were amazing and the food was top notch as well. Must visit this place if you want to try the Kashmiri cuisine. Good place, good food! 👍🏻

Amazing food. Amazing Kashmiri wazawan and Rishta curry, mutton korma curry. Replaced mutton with Potato 🥔 and egg 🥚 for vegetarians too.
Very tasty Kawa with fresh saffron of best quality and dry fruits.
Few of us tried Aalo paratha too and it was as good as north India.
